Memory Task

Disclaimer: By answering the following questions, you are participating in a study being performed by researchers in the University of Toronto Department of Psychology. If you have questions about this research, please contact Dr. Katherine Duncan at duncanlabuoftonlineexp@gmail.com. Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline to answer any or all of the following questions. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.
 
Please ONLY COMPLETE THIS HIT ONCE. You will not be paid for retakes. If you have already completed this HIT or any other version of this HIT and submit it again, all submissions but the first will be rejected, and you will only be paid for the first submission. Having a submission rejected is detrimental to your reputation as a worker, and may prevent you from completing HITs in the future. You must complete this HIT on a computer. If you complete this HIT on a smart phone or tablet, your submission will be rejected. Additionally, the software used to run this experiment can be disrupted by incoming cell phone calls if your phone is linked to your computer. This will prevent you from completing the experiment and receiving your payment, so please TURN OFF YOUR CELL PHONE. Please WRITE DOWN YOUR MTURK WORKER ID NUMBER because you will need to include it during the experiment in order to get paid. Make sure to KEEP THIS TAB OPEN. Please click ACCEPT HIT and then press CONTINUE to move forward.

Information Sheet/Consent Form

 

In this study, you will be shown a series of images and word pairs that you will need to remember. This study will last approximately 1 hour and you will receive $3 for your participation, plus the chance to earn up to $5 in bonus pay. Please be HONEST in your responses. If you cannot remember a word, please leave the text box blank and do not insert a response. These memory questions will be challenging and will require a lot of focus – like doing mental gymnastics. To avoid distraction, please complete this experiment in a quiet environment and have your phone turned off. Please do this study in one setting. Lastly, YOU MUST BE FLUENT IN ENGLISH in order to participate.

Before you start the study please read the following:

  • You must be fluent in English to participate.
  • You can not participate in this HIT more than once
  • Please turn off your cell phone
  • Please write down your worker ID number before starting
  • Please keep this tab open during the study
  • Please accept this hit prior to starting the study

If you are ready to start the study, press the START button below:
